product_overview: Shop Hub is a scalable multi-vendor e-commerce platform that allows customers to browse, purchase, and review products from multiple vendors seamlessly, while vendors can manage their product listings, orders, and payouts. The platform supports real-time notifications, secure payments with commission handling, and an admin panel for platform governance.
core_goals: Enable seamless user registration, authentication, and role-based access control for customers, vendors, and admins.
Support multi-vendor product listings with CRUD capabilities and distinct vendor profiles.
Provide a unified marketplace for product browsing with advanced search and filtering.
Allow customers to manage shopping carts from multiple vendors with real-time updates.
Automate order splitting and sub-order management by vendor for efficient fulfillment.
Implement a secure, automated payment and payout system with platform commission deduction.
Enable customers to leave product and vendor reviews with visible ratings and vendor replies.
Deliver timely notifications for order and payment updates via email and push notifications.
Offer a comprehensive admin dashboard for user, vendor, product, and platform management.
Ensure platform scalability, security, and compliance with industry standards and regulations.
key_features: User authentication system with sign up, sign in, and role-based access control (customer, vendor, admin).
Vendor dashboard for product management, sales statistics, and order overview.
Marketplace page with product browsing, category filtering, and search with real-time suggestions.
Product detail pages showing detailed info, reviews, and add-to-cart functionality.
Shopping cart that supports adding, updating quantities, removing items, and vendor grouping.
Checkout process that handles shipping details, order creation, sub-order splitting, and stock management.
Order history page summarizing customer orders and sub-orders from multiple vendors.
Admin dashboard with vendor management, analytics, product moderation, and commission configuration.
Notification system for order updates, payments, and platform events with user-controlled preferences.
Role-based main navigation reflecting user authentication and permissions.
TypeScript type definitions ensuring strong data model validation for users, products, orders, and reviews.
user_flow_summary: User registration and authentication flow including sign up, sign in, sign out, and role assignment.
Vendor product management cycle: create, update, view, and delete product listings.
Customer browsing marketplace, filtering products, viewing details, and adding to cart.
Shopping cart management flow including item quantity updates and removals with real-time UI refresh.
Order checkout that captures address, processes payment, splits order per vendor, and manages stock.
Order tracking and status updates visible to customers and vendors with sub-order management.
Review submission on product and vendor pages with display of aggregated ratings and vendor replies.
Notification preference management with automated order and payout alerts delivered via email and push.
Admin user and vendor management flow with approval, suspension, analytics, and commission rate setup.
validation_criteria: Users must be able to register, authenticate, and access platform features according to roles without errors.
Vendors should be able to fully manage their product listings with CRUD operations functioning correctly.
Marketplace must display aggregated products with accurate filtering and search ranking delivering results within 500ms.
Shopping cart must update in real-time reflecting correct quantities, removals, and persist across sessions.
Order processing must correctly split orders into sub-orders by vendor and maintain accurate order status.
Payments must be split automatically by vendor with platform commission deducted and payouts tracked.
Reviews should be submitable by customers, immutable by vendors except for replies, and displayed properly.
Notifications must be delivered timely via email and push based on user preferences.
Admin dashboard must allow management of user/vendor accounts, product moderation, and accurate analytics display.
The platform must meet non-functional requirements for performance, security (PCI-DSS, HTTPS), scalability, availability, and compliance with GDPR/CCPA.

features.name: Admin Dashboard
